summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bizdesk365 Power Platform Governance module. Fixed MongoDB _id serialization bug in POST endpoints. All 22 backend API tests pass (100%). All frontend UI flows work correctly including login, navigation, workshop management, actions CRUD, and decisions CRUD.

fixed_during_testing.issue: MongoDB _id not JSON serializable - potential 500 error

passed_tests: Navigation to Power Platform module via /dashboards/power-platform
KPIs display (ateliers, items, actions, décisions, âge moyen, sans propriétaire)
Timeline showing 10 workshops with progress indicators
Workshop detail page with completion criteria and items
Starting a workshop (status change to in_progress)
Item dialog with user story, status, owner, notes, acceptance criteria
Actions page with filters (status, priority, workshop)
All 22 backend API tests (100% pass rate)
seed_data_creation: Test data created during testing: TEST_Action_Title, TEST_Decision via API and UI
context_for_next_testing_agent: Power Platform module fully tested. MongoDB _id serialization bug fixed in POST endpoints for actions, decisions, and evidence. All CRUD operations working. Item IDs follow pattern A{workshop}-{number} (e.g., A1-01, A2-03). Workshop status flow: not_started -> in_progress -> completed.
